statements: SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, created_at FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at < '2022-02-01';
SELECT username, email, created_at FROM users WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM users
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' AND email NOT LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE password_hash IS NOT NULL AND email LIKE '%@example.com%' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM user_authentication WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM access_control ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM access_control WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, username FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_authentication ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.access_level FROM user_authentication u JOIN access_control a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id=100;
SELECT user_id, password FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name='Admin';
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT username, email FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id WHERE username = 'Alice' AND role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 1000 ORDER BY username DESC;

SELECT user_id, role_name, permission_name FROM user_role_mapping JOIN user_roles ON user_roles.role_id = user_role_mapping.role_id JOIN user_permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = user_role_mapping.user_id WHERE role_name = 'Developer' AND permission_name LIKE '%read%';
SELECT DISTINCT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON u.user_id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON urm.role_id = r.role_id ORDER BY u.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' OR password_hash = 'abc123' AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_role_mapping WHERE role_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 2 AND role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_id = 2;

SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM roles INNER JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id INNER JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
